channel.title: Donator Icon
channel.description: How can i show a Donator icon before every donator in game in the chatbox [317] Delta source

item.title: Donator Icon
item.dc:creator: @Togasa Togasa
item.description:
@Togasa wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:5, topic:464445”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=568437.msg4126690#msg4126690 date=1350517908]

Lol try this.
Mkake changes where neccessary.
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && donator == 1 ) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Donator] “+playerName+”:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

This goes right under your ::yell command which should most likely already have something like this in it or atleast staff yell titles.

No, he means just normal chatting.
[/quote]
Could be a he or she… Just putting that out there.

OT: Pack the donator sprite of your choice into the cache with a cache editor, extend the array that loads these sprites by one index, then find where those sprites are assigned/drawn to a position, and just copy that code, replacing the needed variables, respectively.[/quote]
Where can you find the array of the staff/donor icons?

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Icon
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:3, topic:464445”][quote author=Togasa link=topic=568437.msg4126686#msg4126686 date=1350517639]
Lol try this.
Mkake changes where neccessary.
} else if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && donator == 1 ) {
String text = command.substring(5);
yell("[Donator] “+playerName+”:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));

This goes right under your ::yell command which should most likely already have something like this in it or atleast staff yell titles.

[/quote]
No, he means just normal chatting.[/quote]
Could be a he or she… Just putting that out there.

OT: Pack the donator sprite of your choice into the cache with a cache editor, extend the array that loads these sprites by one index, then find where those sprites are assigned/drawn to a position, and just copy that code, replacing the needed variables, respectively.

Read full topic
